issue.title: [Plasma] new subscriber cannot receive notifications about existing objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2565](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2565). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When a client subscribes to plasma store, it is supposed to receive notifications from plasma on existing objects in the store,  it is not able to because its fd is not added to pending_notifiations_ map during when it subscribes so push_notifications() is not able to see the new subscriber.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2565?focusedCommentId=16470979) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2022
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2022>
